title: The X Factor: Celebrity: Love Islanders pay tribute to Queen
text:
The X Factor: Celebrity is soon to be coming to TV screens on October 12 and new group, The Islanders (working title) are ready to go all the way.

The group, made up of ex Love Island stars Wes Nelson, 21, Samira Mighty, 22, Zara McDermott, 23,and Eyal Booker, 24, have paid tribute to Queen's Bohemian Rhapsody for Heat magazine.

And during the interview, Wes couldn't help but make a dig at his ex, Megan Barton Hanson, who he split with after she became jealous of his relationship with Vanessa Bauer on Dancing On Ice.

The X Factor: Celebrity: The Love Islanders pay tribute to Queen in promo shot for Heat... as Wes Nelson (right) throws some serious shade at ex Megan Barton Hanson

Iconic: The new shots take inspiration from Queen's 1975 Bohemian Rhapsody

Now happily dating fellow Love Island star Arabella Chi, he said he has no worries, that their romance will fall victim to the show.

He said: 'I have absolutely no doubts about my relationship. We got on so well. It's a very different dynamic to what I've had before.

'She's just so chilled. It's really nice to be going into this knowing it's going to be absolutely dandy.

The new group want to go 'all the way', release a pop record and go on tour together - but will they be up to it?

More to come: Read the full interview in heat magazine, out now

'Unlike last year, it's worked so much better just taking a chilled out approach to this and going through the process like we would have done, regardless of the shows we've been on.'

Model Eyal claims the band want to go all the way and go on tour together - Zara has been very open about her love of singing on Instagram but was formerly a government policy advisor.

And Samira is a West End star so no doubt they were be able to impress the judges and Wes is a nuclear systems design engineer by trade.

The group are going to have some stiff competition on their hands.

Also competing on the show will be Martin Bashir, Megan McKenna and Hayley Hasselhoff.

The X Factor: Celebrity starts October 12, ITV, 8.35pm

Ouch! During the interview, Wes threw some serious shade at his ex Megan Barton Hanson as he said his new love Arabella Chi (left) is way more chilled out
description: The X Factor: Celebrity is soon to be coming to TV screens on October 12 and new group, The Islanders (working title) are ready to go all the way.
